//: ~~ Generated by projen. To modify, edit .projenrc.js and run "npx projen".
name: alf-cdk

scripts.no-changes: (git log --oneline -1 | grep -q "chore(release):") && echo "No changes to release."
scripts.release: yarn run --silent no-changes || (yarn run bump && git push --follow-tags origin master)
scripts.projen:upgrade: yarn upgrade -L projen && CI="" yarn projen
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn install && yarn run compile && cp src/package.json lib && cd lib && yarn install
scripts.package: rm -fr dist && mkdir -p dist/js && yarn pack && mv *.tgz dist/js/
scripts.test: rm -fr lib/ && jest --passWithNoTests --updateSnapshot && yarn run eslint
scripts.cdkdeploy: yarn run build && cdk deploy alf-cdk-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88 --require-approval never
scripts.cdksynth: yarn run build && cdk synth alf-cdk-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88
scripts.cdkdestroy: yarn run build && yes | cdk destroy alf-cdk-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88
scripts.cdkpipelinediff: yarn run build && cdk diff alf-cdk-pipeline --profile damadden88 || true
scripts.cdkpipelinedeploy: yarn run build && cdk deploy alf-cdk-pipeline --profile damadden88 --require-approval never

bump.desc: Commits a bump to the package version based on conventional commits

projen:upgrade.desc: upgrades projen to the latest version
